|tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|VPN Firewall Router}} :[https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/SL1000/ Product page] (SL1000) {{•}} [https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/SL500/ Product page] (SL500) "SL1000 REV:1.03" and "0314" is silkscreened on the board. *[[ASUS SL1000]] • ''Internet Security Router'' • [http://www.thg.ru/network/20040612/index.html Review] :CPU: [[Philips]] PTD2210 @133MHz (MIPS w/ IPSec) :IPSec (DES, 3DES, MD5 и SHA-1), Gateway-on-a-chip :LX4189 (PRID: c401), Lexra 4xxx/5xxx; Flash: 4MB (CFI) :LAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8201BL/RTL8305SB (5x FE ports) {{See also|ASUS SL500|ASUS SL1200}} ===Reviews=== *[http://www.thg.ru/network/20040612/index.html ''ASUS SL1000'' on '''THG'''] (RU) *[https://foxnetwork.ru/index.php/35-articles/articles/48-handmade-firmware-asus-sl500 ''Handmade Firmware'' on '''FoxNetwork'''] (RU) ===See also=== *[[ASUS SL200]] • ''Internet Security Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/SL200/ PPage] *[[ASUS SL500]] • ''Internet Security Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/SL500/ PPage] *[[ASUS SL1000]] • ''Internet Security Router'' • [http://www.thg.ru/network/20040612/index.html Review] • [https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/SL1000/ PPage] :CPU: [[Philips]] PTD2210 @133MHz (MIPS w/ IPSec) :LAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8201BL/RTL8305SB (5x FE ports) *[[ASUS SL1200]] • ''Internet Security Router'' • [https://old.nag.ru/files/cte/0007/863.jpg PCB] • [https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/SL1000/ PPage] :CPU: [[Ikanos]] IKF6834 (Fusiv Vx200) • [http://foxnetwork.ru/index.php/component/content/article/51-asus-sl1200-sniffering.html FN] :LAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8305SC (5x FE ports) • [https://cms-am.asus.com/ecp/EnterSn.html S/N] *[[ASUS SL6000]] • ''VPN ADSL Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/SL6000/ PPage] *[[ASUS SL6300]] • ''VPN ADSL Router'' (Annex B/D) *[[ASUS RX3041]] (G) • ''Broadband Router'' *[[ASUS RX3041 rev B]] • [https://www.asus.com/event/network/EOL-product/ EoL products] *[[ASUS RX3041H]] • [http://www.thg.ru/network/20051110/index.html Review] *[[ASUS RX3042H]] • [http://www.thg.ru/network/asus_rx3042h/index.html Review] ==Images== ---- [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
